## type [Config](https://github.com/gojek/courier-go/blob/main/consul/config.go#L11-L18)



```go
type Config struct {
    ConsulAddress string
    HealthyOnly   bool
    KVKey         string
    WaitTime      time.Duration
    Logger        *log.Logger
    OTel          *otelcourier.OTel
}
```
